content:
A350 Handbook

General Speaking

In this article, I will conclute all thethings with the AIRBUS-A350, and the skills with the flights. Some of the information comes from Internet.

Display System

Overview

In this image we can know that there are 6 large screens in the cockpit, from the left to the right, they are: OIS, EFIS, the first officer has the same set but it is mirrored. The captain and the first officer share two same screes, one ECAM, the other is MFD. Let’s have a quick look below.

OIS

OIS is called Onboard Information System, it includes most of the flight information, such as airport charts, performance calculator, electric-flight-handbook, and the report of the plane.

EFIS

EFIS is called Electronic Flight Instrument System, this is the core to the modern flight system. EFIS is made with two panel: PFD and ND. We don’t introduce it here.

ECAM

ECAM is called

All the signal is transformed via Avionics Network to the Onboard Computer.ahfioajhfof
